knimeNode.name: Expand Barcode
knimeNode.shortDescription: Expands a barcode columns into its constituents.

fullDescription.intro:
Expands a barcode columns into its constituents (library-code, library-plate-number, project, assay, etc.). It assumes that the input has a text-attribute names 'barcode'.
For the expansion the node assumes to

ports.outPort: The input with additional columns for the barcode properties.
